Package org.activebpel.rt.bpel.def.expr

This package contains base classes and elements used for expression handling.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
IAeExpressionAnalyzer This interface should be implemented in order to provide an implementation of an expression util (used by the AWF Designer to analyze and manipulate expressions).
IAeExpressionAnalyzerContext This interface is passed to the various methods of the IAevExpressionUtil interface to provide contextual information for those activities.
IAeExpressionParser This interface must be implemented by expression parsers.
IAeExpressionParserContext This interface defines a context used by expression parsers.
IAeExpressionParseResult This interface defines what an expression parse result is.
 

Class Summary
AeAbstractExpressionAnalyzer This is a base class for any concrete, language specific implementation of an expression analyzer.
AeAbstractExpressionParser An abstract expression parser that language impls can extend.
AeAbstractExpressionParseResult An abstract parse result object that can be extended by language specific impls.
AeExpressionAnalyzerContext An implementation of the expression util context.
AeExpressionLanguageUtil This class has some static convenience methods for doing various tasks related to expressions and expression languages.
AeExpressionParserContext A simple expression parser.
AeNoOpExpressionAnalyzer Implements a no-op version of the expression analyzer.
AePrefixedExpressionAnalyzer This is a based class for the xpath and xquery expression analyzers.
AeScriptFuncDef This class represents a single function in an expression.
AeScriptVarDef This class represents a variable reference found in an expression.
IAeExpressionAnalyzer.AeExpressionToSpecDetails A class that holds the result of parsing an expression to-spec.
 

Package org.activebpel.rt.bpel.def.expr Description

This package contains base classes and elements used for expression handling. This package contains all those classes related to expressions but not related to validation or execution. It also contains classes related to the analysis of expressions.
